Title: Do The Indians Have Enough Of The 'Right Stuff' in the Rotation and Pen to Be Successful in 2021?
Description: Despite losing the likes of Corey Kluber, Trevor Bauer, Mike Clevinger and Carlos Carrasco the last two seasons, the Indians pitching staff is still clearly the strength of their roster. With a mix of youth and veteran experience the team is hoping that they can count on the rotation and pen to carry the club to another division title in 2021 and not fall apart.
Author: Sports Illustrated
